answers.answer: Sudden double vision can be a very serious problem due to things as serious as a stroke, tumor, diabetes, etc. You need to schedule an EMERGENCY appointment with an ophthalmologist Tuesday at the latest. If necessary go to the emergency room.TREAT THIS AS AN EMERGENCY!JCH III MD   Eye Physician & Surgeon

question: ME AND MY PARTNER ARE  DUE TO FLY ON SAT IN 4 DAYS TIME, HOWEVER HE HAS WOKE UP WITH DOUBLE VISION. WILL HE BE OK TO FLY.
title: FLYING WITH DOUBLE VISION
